data.expected_result: To either block image or display it
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload this gif: `https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/156650454850207744/269761755654258688/l5XDRhAnxaGEzhWW.gif` on PC - View it on Android - on Desktop it will show as "This image is too large to embed" and on Android it will crash
